content.text: Hardworking and passionate job seeker with strong organizational skills eager to secure React Developer position. Ready to help team achieve company goals.

list.name: Bitscopic
list.description: Medical projects, migration from Ember.js to React.js, and interface refresh. My main role was to rebuild an application based on Ember.js using React.js, Zustand, and MUI Material. Additionally, I wrote end-to-end tests using Cypress, and I was responsible for code optimization and bug fixing.

list.name: Infonet Projekt SA
list.description: In the first months of my work, I was responsible for testing and writing tests for a proprietary application for managing information systems within companies. Additionally, I was in charge of refreshing the application's interface and creating user documentation based on Next.js.

list.name: Career break
list.description: I took care of my seriously ill wife for two years, and after her passing, I took care of our children.

list.name: Freelancer
list.description: In my self-employment period, I worked on many interesting projects, mainly being responsible for frontend development. I primarily worked with the React.js library.
